dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 20 × 13.2 cm (7 7/8 × 5 3/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings:
Inscribed in graphite, lower left corner: 62

In graphite, verso lower right: Junius S. Morgan (Lugt 1536)
inscribed:
Two lines in Latin inscribed in plate, upper center: CHRISTOPHORUS PLANTINUS Architypographus Regius, / vixit annos LXXV. obijtque Antuerpiae CIC.IC.LXXXIX.

Inscribed around Plantin's device on table, lower left: LABORE ET CONSTAN TIA.

Signed in plate, lower right corner: HGoltzius fecit

Eight lines in Latin in margin below plate, lower center: Plantinum tibi, ... Saecula docta tuo. / I. BOCHIVS.
